title: Steffan the violin maker
creator_credit: Coronet Films, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Paul Saltzman
brief_description: Shows the painstaking process of violin making by focussing on sixteen year old Steffan Kellar, an apprentice violin maker and violinist living in West Germany. Highlights the beauty of the violin as a musical instrument, as well as indicating its cultural heritage.
